ValidationRule.description: Validation Rule, cuando el Shipment sea tipo Flete nacional (FN) / Service Mode = NATIONAL , pida obligatorio el campo Traslado_Ingreso_c
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( OR(Shipment_Type__c = "FN", Shipment_Type__c = "FI", Shipment_Type__c = "PTO" ), OR(ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status_Plann__c,"In Progress" ), ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status_Plann__c,"Confirmed" )), ISPICKVAL(Traslado_Ingreso__c, ""), YEAR(DATEVALUE (CreatedDate)) < 2022
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CP001: Error / Must be Choose TIPO CARTA PORTE (Debes de capturar el tipo de carta porte)
